title: Insolvency of employer not to release insurer
context: [ยง392-49] Insolvency of employer not to release insurer. Every policy and contract of insurance issued for the purposes of this chapter shall contain a provision to the effect that the insolvency or bankruptcy of the employer and the employer&rsquo;s discharge therein shall not relieve the insurer from the payment of temporary disability benefits during the life of the policy or contract. [L 1969, c 148, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985]
